"],"url":"/product-page/isopropyl-alcohol-acs","documentImage":{"name":"b44a5c_abc6da576ab34945bba9ce49a8763529~mv2.png","height":1386.0,"width":1386.0},"description":"Solvent for Industrial Applications: Due to its ability to dissolve a wide range of non-polar compounds, 99% isopropyl alcohol is extensively used as a solvent in industries such as pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, and electronics. It's particularly useful for cleaning electronic components (such as circuit boards) because it evaporates quickly, leaving no residue. Cleaning Agent: In addition to its use as a solvent, 99% isopropyl alcohol is a powerful cleaning agent for removing sticky residues, ink stains, or grease from various surfaces. It's also used for cleaning glass and mirrors for a streak-free finish, as well as for preparing surfaces before painting or coating, ensuring that they are free of oils and other contaminants. Safety-Data-SheetSpecification-Sheet","discountedPrice":"$30.00","collections":["Prepackaged products"],"discountedPriceNumeric":30.0,"onSale":false,"id":"45b3e71e-0a07-0b77-5868-e3c70394b3d8","documentType":"public/stores/products","currency":"USD","title":"Isopropyl Alcohol ACS"},{"_score":51.318188,"inStock":true,"_updated":"2025-04-13T17:07:29.775Z","sku":null,"infoSections":["Product Info","

"],"url":"/product-page/glacial-acetic-acid-acs","documentImage":{"name":"b44a5c_f7007cc72a984b17b06388ed33a2ea49~mv2.png","height":3000.0,"width":3000.0},"description":"Manufacturing of Vinyl Acetate Monomer (VAM): Glacial acetic acid is a key ingredient in the production of VAM, which is a precursor to polyvinyl acetate and polyvinyl alcohol. These polymers are used in adhesives, paints, films, and textiles.Food Industry: In its diluted form, acetic acid is widely known as vinegar, which is used as a condiment and preservative. Glacial acetic acid can be used to adjust acidity in food products and as a food additive for flavoring.Chemical Synthesis and Pharmaceuticals: It serves as a solvent and reagent in the synthesis of various chemicals, including aspirin and other pharmaceuticals.
